summary: Six couples in love must face different problems caused by love itself. Do they resolve their issues and face life anew, or do they succumb under pressure ?
cast: Salman Khan|Priyanka Chopra|Anil Kapoor|Juhi Chawla|Akshaye Khanna|Ayesha Takia|John Abraham|Vidya Balan|Govinda|Shannon Esra|Sohail Khan|Isha Koppikar|Anjana Sukhani|Kushal Punjabi|Vishal Malhotra|Kamini Khanna|Prem Chopra|Arun Bakshi|Ashwani Chopra|Mangala Kenkre|Steve Motion|Smita Hai|Atul Parchure|Deepak Qazir|Saurabh Shukla|Manoj Pahwa|Lee Alliston|Tinnu Anand|Steven Baker|Manoj Bakshi|Neele Bjerre|Renuka Bondre|Anang Desai|Vrajesh Hirjee|Rebecca James|Daniel Jefferson|Beena Kak|Viju Khote|Nihal Kodhaty|Sujata Kumar|Sujatha Kumar|Celina Nessa|Heather Pearse|K.K. Raina|Kenny Solomons|Iona Thonger|Andrew Winmill|Arjun Kapoor
title: Salaam-E-Ishq
